00028 // GENERAL CONSTRUCTOR 
00029 //
00065 
00066 EvolutionaryAlgorithm::EvolutionaryAlgorithm(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00067 : TrainingAlgorithm(newObjectiveFunctional)
00068 {
00069    // Multilayer perceptron
00070 
00071    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00072 
00073    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00074 
00075    // Fitness assignment method
00076 
00077    fitnessAssignmentMethod = LinearRanking;
00078 
00079    // Selection method
00080 
00081    selectionMethod = StochasticUniversalSampling;
00082 
00083    // Recombination method
00084 
00085    recombinationMethod = Intermediate;
00086 
00087    // Mutation method
00088 
00089    mutationMethod = Normal;
00090 
00091    // Training parameters
00092 
00093    populationSize = 10*numberOfFreeParameters;
00094 
00095    selectivePressure = 1.5;
00096 
00097    recombinationSize = 0.25;
00098 
00099    mutationRate = 1.0/(double)numberOfFreeParameters;
00100    mutationRange = 0.1;
00101 
00102    // Stopping criteria
00103 
00104    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00105    maximumTime = 1.0e12;
00106 
00107    maximumNumberOfGenerations = 100;
00108 
00109    displayPeriod = 1;
00110 
00111    // Population matrix
00112 
00113    population.resize(populationSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
00114 
00115    initPopulationNormal();
00116 
00117    // Evaluation vector
00118 
00119    evaluation.resize(populationSize);
00120 
00121    // Fitness vector
00122 
00123    fitness.resize(populationSize);
00124 
00125    // Selection vector
00126 
00127    selection.resize(populationSize);
00128 
00129    reservePopulationHistory = false;
00130    reserveMeanNormHistory = false;
00131    reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory = false;
00132    reserveBestNormHistory = false;
00133    reserveMeanEvaluationHistory = false;
00134    reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory = false;
00135    reserveBestEvaluationHistory = false;
00136 }

00174 
00175 EvolutionaryAlgorithm::EvolutionaryAlgorithm(void) : TrainingAlgorithm()
00176 {
00177    // Fitness assignment method
00178 
00179    fitnessAssignmentMethod = LinearRanking;
00180 
00181    // Selection method
00182 
00183    selectionMethod = StochasticUniversalSampling;
00184 
00185    // Recombination method
00186 
00187    recombinationMethod = Intermediate;
00188 
00189    // Mutation method
00190 
00191    mutationMethod = Normal;
00192 
00193    // Training parameters
00194 
00195    populationSize = 0;
00196 
00197    selectivePressure = 1.5;
00198 
00199    recombinationSize = 0.25;
00200 
00201    mutationRate = 0.1;
00202    mutationRange = 0.1;
00203 
00204    // Stopping criteria
00205 
00206    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00207    maximumTime = 1.0e12;
00208 
00209    maximumNumberOfGenerations = 100;
00210 
00211    displayPeriod = 1;
00212 
00213    reservePopulationHistory = false;
00214    reserveMeanNormHistory = false;
00215    reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory = false;
00216    reserveBestNormHistory = false;
00217    reserveMeanEvaluationHistory = false;
00218    reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory = false;
00219    reserveBestEvaluationHistory = false;
00220 }

00284 // void setPopulationSize(int) method
00285 //
00291 
00292 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::setPopulationSize(int newPopulationSize)
00293 {
00294    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00295 
00296    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00297 
00298    if(newPopulationSize < 4)
00299    {
00300       std::cerr << std::endl
00301                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00302                 << "void setPopulationSize(int) method." << std::endl
00303                 << "New population size must be equal or greater than 4." << std::endl
00304                 << std::endl;
00305 
00306       exit(1);
00307    }
00308    else if(newPopulationSize%2 != 0)
00309    {
00310       std::cerr << std::endl
00311                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00312                 << "void setPopulationSize(int) method."
00313                 << std::endl
00314                 << "New population size is not divisible by 2." << std::endl
00315                 << std::endl;
00316 
00317       exit(1);
00318    }
00319    else
00320    {
00321       populationSize = newPopulationSize;
00322 
00323       // Set population matrix
00324 
00325       population.resize(populationSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
00326 
00327       initPopulationNormal();
00328 
00329       // Set evaluation vector
00330 
00331       evaluation.resize(populationSize);
00332 
00333       // Set fitness vector
00334 
00335       fitness.resize(populationSize);
00336 
00337       // Set selection vector
00338 
00339       selection.resize(populationSize);
00340    }
00341 }

00507 // void setPopulation(Matrix<double>) method
00508 
00512 
00513 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::setPopulation(Matrix<double> newPopulation)
00514 {
00515    // Control sentence (if debug)
00516 
00517    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00518 
00519    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00520 
00521    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
00522 
00523    if(newPopulation.getNumberOfRows() != populationSize)
00524    {
00525       std::cerr << std::endl
00526                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00527                 << "void setPopulation(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
00528                 << "New population size is not equal to population size." << std::endl
00529                 << std::endl;
00530 
00531       exit(1);
00532    }
00533    else if(newPopulation.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfFreeParameters)
00534    {
00535       std::cerr << std::endl
00536                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00537                 << "void setPopulation(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
00538                 << "New number of free parameters is not equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00539                 << std::endl;
00540 
00541       exit(1);
00542    }
00543 
00544    #endif
00545 
00546    // Set population
00547 
00548    population = newPopulation;
00549 }

00741 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::setReserveAllTrainingHistory(bool newReserveAllTrainingHistory)
00742 {
00743    reserveElapsedTimeHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00744    reserveFreeParametersHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00745    reserveFreeParametersNormHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00746    reserveEvaluationHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00747 
00748    reservePopulationHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00749    reserveMeanNormHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00750    reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00751    reserveBestNormHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00752    reserveMeanEvaluationHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00753    reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00754    reserveBestEvaluationHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00755 }

00850 // Vector<double> getIndividual(int) method
00851 
00855 
00856 Vector<double> EvolutionaryAlgorithm::getIndividual(int i)
00857 {
00858    // Control sentence (if debug)
00859 
00860    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00861 
00862    if(i >= populationSize)
00863    {
00864       std::cerr << std::endl
00865                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00866                 << "Vector<double> getIndividual(int) method." << std::endl
00867                 << "Index must be less than population size." << std::endl
00868                                 << std::endl;
00869 
00870       exit(1);
00871    }
00872   
00873    #endif
00874 
00875    // Get individual
00876 
00877    Vector<double> individual = population.getRow(i);
00878 
00879    return(individual);
00880 }
00881 
00882 
00883 // setIndividual(int, Vector<double>) method
00884 
00889 
00890 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::setIndividual(int i, Vector<double> individual)
00891 {
00892    // Control sentence (if debug)
00893 
00894    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00895  
00896    int size = individual.getSize();
00897 
00898    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00899 
00900    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00901 
00902    if(i >= populationSize)
00903    {
00904       std::cerr << std::endl
00905                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00906                 << "setIndividual(int, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00907                 << "Index must be less than population size." << std::endl
00908                                 << std::endl;
00909 
00910       exit(1);
00911    }
00912    else if(size != numberOfFreeParameters)
00913    {
00914       std::cerr << std::endl
00915                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00916                 << "setIndividual(int, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00917                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00918                                 << std::endl;
00919 
00920       exit(1);
00921    }
00922   
00923    #endif
00924 
00925    // Get individual
00926 
00927    population.setRow(i, individual);
00928 }
00929 
00930 
00931 // Vector<double> calculatePopulationNorm(void) method
00932 
00934 
00935 Vector<double> EvolutionaryAlgorithm::calculatePopulationNorm(void)
00936 {
00937    Vector<double> populationNorm(populationSize);
00938       
00939    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
00940    {
00941       Vector<double> individual = getIndividual(i); 
00942            
00943       populationNorm[i] = individual.calculateNorm();     
00944    }               
00945    
00946    return(populationNorm);            
00947 }

01066 
01067 // void setSelectivePressure(double) method
01068 
01076 
01077 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::setSelectivePressure(double newSelectivePressure)
01078 {
01079    switch(fitnessAssignmentMethod)
01080    {
01081       case LinearRanking:
01082 
01083          if((newSelectivePressure < 1.0) || (newSelectivePressure > 2.0))
01084          {
01085             std::cerr << std::endl
01086                       << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01087                       << "void setSelectivePressure(double) method. "
01088                       << "Case linear ranking." << std::endl
01089                       << "Selective pressure must be a value between 1 and 2." << std::endl 
01090                       << std::endl;
01091 
01092             exit(1);
01093          }
01094          
01095                  // Set selective pressure
01096 
01097                  selectivePressure = newSelectivePressure;
01098 
01099       break;
01100    }
01101 }
01102 
01103 
01104 // void setRecombinationSize(double) method
01105 
01113 
01114 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::setRecombinationSize(double newRecombinationSize)
01115 {
01116    if(newRecombinationSize < 0.0)
01117    {
01118       std::cerr << std::endl
01119                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01120                 << "void setRecombinationSize(double) method." << std::endl
01121                 << "Recombination size must be equal or greater than 0." << std::endl
01122                 << std::endl;
01123 
01124       exit(1);
01125    }
01126 
01127    // Set recombination size
01128 
01129    recombinationSize = newRecombinationSize;
01130 }

01289 // void initPopulationUniform(void) method
01290 
01293 
01294 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::initPopulationUniform(void)
01295 {
01296    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01297 
01298    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
01299 
01300    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters);
01301 
01302    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01303    {
01304       individual = getIndividual(i);
01305 
01306       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
01307       {
01308          double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
01309 
01310          individual[j] = -1.0 + 2.0*random;
01311       }
01312 
01313       setIndividual(i, individual);
01314    }
01315 }

01326 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::initPopulationUniform(double minimum, double maximum)
01327 {

01329

01331

01333    {
01334       std::cerr << std::endl
01335                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01336                 << "void initPopulationUniform(double, double) method." << std::endl
01337                 << "Minimum initialization value must be less than maximum value." << std::endl
01338                                 << std::endl;
01339 
01340       exit(1);
01341    }
01342 
01343    #endif
01344 
01345    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01346 
01347    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
01348 
01349    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters);
01350 
01351    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01352    {
01353       individual = getIndividual(i);
01354 
01355       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
01356       {
01357          double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
01358 
01359          individual[j] = minimum + (maximum-minimum)*random;
01360       }
01361 
01362       setIndividual(i, individual);
01363    }
01364 }

01476 
01477 // void initPopulationNormal(void) method
01478 
01481 
01482 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::initPopulationNormal(void)
01483 {
01484    double mean = 0.0;
01485    double standardDeviation = 1.0;     
01486 
01487    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron
01488    = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01489 
01490    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
01491 
01492    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters);
01493 
01494    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
01495    
01496    double random1 = 0.0;
01497    double random2 = 0.0;
01498 
01499    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01500    {
01501       individual = getIndividual(i);
01502 
01503       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
01504       {
01505          do
01506          {
01507             random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
01508 
01509          }while(random1 == 0.0);
01510 
01511          random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
01512 
01513          // Box-Muller transformation
01514 
01515          double normallyDistributedRandomNumber 
01516          = mean + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation;
01517 
01518          individual[j] = normallyDistributedRandomNumber;
01519       }
01520 
01521       setIndividual(i, individual);
01522    }
01523 }
01524

01556        
01557          }while(random1 == 0.0);

01560

01715 
01716 // void evaluatePopulation(void) method
01717 
01722 
01723 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::evaluatePopulation(void)
01724 {
01725    // Multilayer perceptron
01726 
01727    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01728 
01729    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
01730 
01731    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters);
01732 
01733    // Evaluate objective functional for all individuals
01734 
01735    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01736    {
01737       individual = getIndividual(i);
01738 
01739       evaluation[i] = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(individual);
01740       
01741       if(!(evaluation[i] > -1.0e69 && evaluation[i] < 1.0e69))
01742       {
01743          std::cerr << std::endl
01744                    << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01745                    << "void evaluatePopulation(void) method." << std::endl
01746                    << "Evaluation of individual " << i << " is not a real number." << std::endl
01747                    << std::endl;
01748 
01749          exit(1);
01750       }                
01751    }
01752 }
01753 
01754 
01755 // void performLinearRankingFitnessAssignment(void) method
01756 //
01763 
01764 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performLinearRankingFitnessAssignment(void)
01765 {
01766    // Sorted evaluation vector
01767 
01768    Vector<double> sortedEvaluation(populationSize);
01769 
01770    sortedEvaluation = evaluation;
01771 
01772    std::sort(sortedEvaluation.begin(), sortedEvaluation.end(), std::less<double>());
01773 
01774    // Rank vector
01775 
01776    Vector<int> rank(populationSize);
01777 
01778    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01779    {
01780       for(int j = 0; j < populationSize; j++)
01781       {
01782          if(evaluation[j] == sortedEvaluation[i])
01783          {
01784             rank[j] = populationSize - i;
01785          }
01786       }
01787    }
01788 
01789    // Perform linear ranking fitness assignment
01790 
01791    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01792    {
01793       fitness[i] = 2.0 - selectivePressure
01794       + 2.0*(selectivePressure - 1.0)*(rank[i] - 1.0)/(populationSize - 1.0);
01795       
01796       if(!(fitness[i] > -1.0e69 && fitness[i] < 1.0e69))
01797       {
01798          std::cerr << std::endl
01799                    << "Flooe Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01800                    << "void performLinearRankingFitnessAssignment(void) method." << std::endl
01801                    << "Fitness of individual " << i << " is not a real number." << std::endl
01802                    << std::endl;
01803 
01804          exit(1);
01805       }          
01806    }
01807 }
01808 
01809 // void performRouletteWheelSelection(void) method
01810 
01817 
01818 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performRouletteWheelSelection(void)
01819 {
01820    // Set selection vector to false 
01821 
01822    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01823    {
01824       selection[i] = false;
01825    }
01826 
01827    int numberOfSelectedIndividuals = populationSize/2;
01828 
01829    Vector<double> cumulativeFitness(populationSize);
01830 
01831    // Cumulative fitness vector
01832 
01833    cumulativeFitness[0] = fitness[0]; 
01834 
01835    for(int i = 1; i < populationSize; i++)
01836    {
01837       cumulativeFitness[i] = cumulativeFitness[i-1] + fitness[i];
01838    }
01839 
01840    // Select individuals until the desired number of selections is obtained
01841 
01842    int countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals = 0;
01843 
01844    do
01845    {
01846       // Random number between 0 and total cumulative fitness
01847 
01848       double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
01849 
01850       double pointer = cumulativeFitness[populationSize-1]*random;
01851 
01852       // Perform selection
01853 
01854       if(pointer < cumulativeFitness[0])
01855       {
01856          if(selection[0] == false)
01857          {
01858             selection[0] = true;
01859             countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals++;
01860          }
01861       }
01862       
01863       for(int i = 1; i < populationSize; i++)
01864       {
01865          if(pointer < cumulativeFitness[i] && pointer >= cumulativeFitness[i-1])
01866          {
01867             if(selection[i] == false)
01868             {
01869                selection[i] = true;
01870                countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals++;
01871             }
01872          }
01873       }
01874    }while(countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals != numberOfSelectedIndividuals);
01875 
01876    // Control sentence
01877 
01878    if(countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals != numberOfSelectedIndividuals)
01879    {
01880       std::cerr << std::endl 
01881                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01882                 << "void performRouletteWheelSelection(void) method." << std::endl
01883                 << "Count number of selected individuals is not equal to number of selected individuals."
01884                 << std::endl << std::endl;
01885 
01886       exit(1);
01887    }
01888 }
01889 
01890 
01891 // void performStochasticUniversalSamplingSelection(void) method
01892 //
01899 
01900 
01901 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performStochasticUniversalSamplingSelection(void)
01902 {
01903    // Set selection vector to false
01904 
01905    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
01906    {
01907       selection[i] = false;
01908    }
01909  
01910    int numberOfSelectedIndividuals = populationSize/2;
01911 
01912    Vector<double> cumulativeFitness(populationSize);
01913 
01914    Vector<double> pointer(numberOfSelectedIndividuals);
01915 
01916    // Cumulative fitness vector
01917 
01918    cumulativeFitness[0] = fitness[0];
01919 
01920    for(int i = 1; i < populationSize; i++)
01921    {  
01922       cumulativeFitness[i] = cumulativeFitness[i-1] + fitness[i];
01923    }
01924 
01925 
01926    // Pointer vector
01927 
01928    // Random number between 0 and totalCumulativeFitnees/(double)numberOfSelectedIndividuals 
01929 
01930    double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
01931 
01932    pointer[0] = random
01933    *cumulativeFitness[populationSize-1]/(double)numberOfSelectedIndividuals;
01934 
01935    for(int i = 1; i < numberOfSelectedIndividuals; i++)
01936    {
01937       pointer[i] = pointer[i-1] 
01938       + cumulativeFitness[populationSize-1]/(double)numberOfSelectedIndividuals;
01939    }
01940 
01941    // Selection vector
01942 
01943    int countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals = 0;
01944 
01945    if(pointer[0] <= cumulativeFitness[0])
01946    {
01947       selection[0] = true;
01948       countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals++;
01949    }
01950 
01951    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSelectedIndividuals; i++)
01952    {
01953       for(int j = 1; j < populationSize; j++)
01954       {
01955          if(pointer[i] <= cumulativeFitness[j] && pointer[i] > cumulativeFitness[j-1])
01956          {
01957             selection[j] = true;
01958             countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals++;
01959          }
01960       }
01961    }
01962 
01963    // Number of selected individuals control sentence 
01964 
01965    if(countNumberOfSelectedIndividuals != numberOfSelectedIndividuals)
01966    {
01967       std::cerr << std::endl
01968                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
01969                 << "void performStochasticUniversalSamplingSelection(void) method." << std::endl
01970                 << "Count number of selected individuals is not equal to number of selected individuals." 
01971                 << std::endl << std::endl;
01972 
01973       exit(1);
01974    }
01975 }
01976 
01977 
01978 // void performIntermediateRecombination(void) method
01979 
01989 
01990 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performIntermediateRecombination(void)
01991 {
01992    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01993      
01994    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
01995 
01996    Matrix<double> newPopulation(populationSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
01997 
01998    int count = 0;
01999    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02000    {
02001       if(selection[i] == true)
02002       count ++;        
02003    }
02004 
02005    Vector<double> parent1(numberOfFreeParameters);
02006    Vector<double> parent2(numberOfFreeParameters);
02007 
02008    Vector<double> offspring(numberOfFreeParameters);
02009 
02010    Matrix<int> recombination(populationSize, 2);
02011 
02012    // Start recombination   
02013 
02014    int countNewPopulationSize = 0;
02015 
02016    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02017    {
02018       if(selection[i] == true)
02019       {
02020          // Set parent 1
02021 
02022          parent1 = getIndividual(i);
02023 
02024          // Generate 2 offspring with parent 1
02025 
02026          for(int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
02027          {
02028             // Choose parent 2 at random among selected individuals   
02029 
02030             bool parent2Candidate = false;
02031 
02032             do{
02033                // Integer random number beteen 0 and population size
02034 
02035                double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02036 
02037                int parent2CandidateIndex = (int)(populationSize*random);
02038 
02039                // Check if candidate for parent 2 is ok
02040 
02041                if(selection[parent2CandidateIndex] == true && parent2CandidateIndex != i)
02042                {
02043                   parent2Candidate = true;
02044 
02045                   recombination[countNewPopulationSize][0] = i;
02046 
02047                   recombination[countNewPopulationSize][1] = parent2CandidateIndex;
02048 
02049                   parent2 = getIndividual(parent2CandidateIndex);
02050 
02051                   // Perform inediate recombination between parent 1 and parent 2
02052 
02053                   for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
02054                   {
02055                      // Choose the scaling factor to be a random number between
02056                      // -recombinationSize and 1+recombinationSize for each
02057                      // variable anew.
02058 
02059                      double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02060 
02061                      double scalingFactor = -1.0*recombinationSize + (1.0 + recombinationSize)*random;
02062 
02063                      offspring[j] = scalingFactor*parent1[j] + (1.0 - scalingFactor)*parent2[j];
02064                   }
02065 
02066                   // Add offspring to newPopulation matrix
02067 
02068                   newPopulation.setRow(countNewPopulationSize, offspring);   
02069                   
02070                   countNewPopulationSize++;
02071                }
02072             }while(parent2Candidate != true);
02073          }
02074       }
02075    }
02076 
02077    // Count number of new individuals control sentence
02078 
02079    if(countNewPopulationSize != populationSize)
02080    {
02081       std::cerr << std::endl 
02082                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
02083                 << "void performIntermediateRecombination(void) method." << std::endl
02084                 << "Count new population size is not equal to population size." 
02085                 << std::endl
02086                 << std::endl;
02087 
02088       exit(1);
02089    }
02090 
02091    // Set new population
02092 
02093    population = newPopulation;
02094 }
02095 
02096 
02097 // void performLineRecombination(void) method
02098 
02107 
02108 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performLineRecombination(void)
02109 {
02110    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02111      
02112    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02113 
02114    Matrix<double> newPopulation(populationSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02115 
02116    Vector<double> parent1(numberOfFreeParameters);
02117    Vector<double> parent2(numberOfFreeParameters);
02118 
02119    Vector<double> offspring(numberOfFreeParameters);
02120 
02121    Matrix<int> recombination(populationSize, 2);
02122 
02123    // Start recombination   
02124 
02125    int countNewPopulationSize = 0;
02126 
02127    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02128    {
02129       if(selection[i] == true)
02130       {
02131          // Set parent 1
02132 
02133          parent1 = getIndividual(i);
02134 
02135          // Generate 2 offspring with parent 1
02136 
02137          for(int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
02138          {
02139             // Choose parent 2 at random among selected individuals   
02140 
02141             bool parent2Candidate = false;
02142 
02143             do
02144             {
02145                // Integer random number beteen 0 and population size
02146 
02147                double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX + 1.0);
02148 
02149                int parent2CandidateIndex = (int)(populationSize*random);
02150 
02151                // Check if candidate for parent 2 is ok
02152 
02153                if(selection[parent2CandidateIndex] == true && parent2CandidateIndex != i)
02154                {
02155                   parent2Candidate = true;
02156 
02157                   recombination[countNewPopulationSize][0] = i;
02158                   recombination[countNewPopulationSize][1] = parent2CandidateIndex;
02159 
02160                   parent2 = getIndividual(parent2CandidateIndex);
02161 
02162                   // Perform inediate recombination between parent 1
02163                   // and parent 2
02164 
02165                   // Choose the scaling factor to be a random number between
02166                   // -recombinationSize and 1+recombinationSize for all
02167                   // variables.
02168 
02169                   double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02170 
02171                   double scalingFactor = -1.0*recombinationSize 
02172                   + (1.0 + recombinationSize)*random;
02173 
02174                   offspring = parent1*scalingFactor + parent2*(1.0 - scalingFactor);
02175 
02176                   // Add offspring to newPopulation matrix
02177 
02178                   newPopulation.setRow(countNewPopulationSize, offspring);   
02179 
02180                   countNewPopulationSize++;
02181                }
02182             }while(parent2Candidate == false);
02183          }
02184       }
02185    }
02186 
02187    // Count new population size control sentence
02188 
02189    if(countNewPopulationSize != populationSize)
02190    {
02191       std::cerr << std::endl
02192                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
02193                 << "void performLineRecombination(void) method." << std::endl
02194                 << "Count new population size is not equal to population size." << std::endl 
02195                 << std::endl;
02196 
02197       exit(1);
02198    }
02199 
02200    // Set new population
02201 
02202    population = newPopulation;
02203 }
02204 
02205 
02206 // void performNormalMutation(void) method
02207 
02217 
02218 
02219 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performNormalMutation(void)
02220 {
02221    const double pi = 3.141592654;
02222 
02223    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02224      
02225    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02226 
02227    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters);
02228 
02229    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02230    {
02231       individual = getIndividual(i);
02232 
02233       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
02234       {
02235          // Random number between 0 and 1
02236 
02237          double pointer = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02238 
02239          if(pointer < mutationRate)
02240          {
02241             // Random numbers between 0 and 1
02242 
02243             double random1 = 0.0;
02244             
02245             do // random1 cannot be zero
02246             {
02247                random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02248             
02249             }while(random1 == 0);
02250 
02251             double random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02252 
02253             // Box-Muller transformation
02254 
02255             double mean = 0.0;
02256             double standardDeviation = mutationRange;
02257 
02258             double normallyDistributedRandomNumber 
02259             = mean + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation;
02260 
02261             individual[j] += normallyDistributedRandomNumber;
02262          }
02263       }
02264 
02265       setIndividual(i, individual);
02266    }
02267 }  
02268 
02269 
02270 // void performUniformMutation(void) method
02271 
02280 
02281 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::performUniformMutation(void)
02282 {
02283    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02284      
02285    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02286    
02287    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters, 0.0);
02288 
02289    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02290    {
02291       individual = getIndividual(i);
02292 
02293       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
02294       {
02295          // random number between 0 and 1
02296 
02297          double pointer = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02298 
02299          if(pointer < mutationRate)
02300          {
02301             // random number between 0 and 1
02302 
02303             double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02304 
02305             double uniformlyDistributedRandomNumber
02306             = (-1.0 + 2.0*random)*mutationRange;
02307 
02308             individual[j] += uniformlyDistributedRandomNumber;
02309          }
02310       }
02311 
02312       setIndividual(i, individual);
02313    }
02314 }
02315 
02316 
02317 // void train(void) method
02318 
02328 
02329 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::train(void)
02330 {
02331    // Control sentence (if debug)
02332 
02333    #ifndef NDEBUG 
02334 
02335    if(objectiveFunctional == NULL)
02336    {
02337       std::cout << std::endl
02338                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
02339                 << "void train(void) method." << std::endl
02340                 << "Pointer to objective functional object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
02341                 << std::endl;
02342 
02343       exit(1);
02344    }
02345 
02346    #endif
02347 
02348    // Multilayer perceptron
02349 
02350    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02351 
02352    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
02353 
02354    // Training time stuff
02355 
02356    time_t beginningTime, currentTime;
02357 
02358    double elapsedTime = 0.0;
02359 
02360    // Start training
02361 
02362    time(&beginningTime);
02363 
02364    if(display)
02365    {
02366       std::cout << std::endl
02367                 << "Training with the evolutionary algorithm..." 
02368                 << std::endl;
02369    }
02370 
02371    // Evaluation of population
02372 
02373    evaluatePopulation();
02374 
02375    // Check for best individual
02376 
02377    Vector<double> bestIndividual(numberOfFreeParameters, 0.0);
02378 
02379    double bestNorm = 0.0;
02380 
02381    double bestEvaluation = 1.0e99;
02382 
02383    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02384    {
02385       if(evaluation[i] < bestEvaluation)
02386       {
02387          bestIndividual = getIndividual(i);
02388 
02389          bestNorm = bestIndividual.calculateNorm();
02390 
02391          bestEvaluation = evaluation[i];       
02392          
02393          // Set best individual free paramterers to multilayer perceptron
02394 
02395          multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(bestIndividual);        
02396       }
02397    }
02398 
02399    resizeTrainingHistory(maximumNumberOfGenerations+1);
02400 
02401    // Elapsed time
02402 
02403    time(&currentTime);
02404    elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
02405 
02406    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02407    {
02408       elapsedTimeHistory[0] = elapsedTime;
02409    }
02410 
02411    // Population
02412 
02413    if(reservePopulationHistory)
02414    {
02415       populationHistory[0] = population; 
02416    }
02417 
02418    Vector<double> populationNorm = calculatePopulationNorm();
02419 
02420    // Mean norm 
02421 
02422    double meanNorm = populationNorm.calculateMean();
02423 
02424    if(reserveMeanNormHistory)
02425    {
02426       meanNormHistory[0] = meanNorm;
02427    }
02428 
02429    // Standard deviation of norm
02430 
02431    double standardDeviationNorm = populationNorm.calculateStandardDeviation();
02432 
02433    if(reserveMeanNormHistory)
02434    {
02435       standardDeviationNormHistory[0] = standardDeviationNorm;                                
02436    }
02437 
02438    // Best individual norm
02439 
02440    if(reserveBestNormHistory)
02441    {
02442       bestNormHistory[0] = bestNorm;
02443    }
02444 
02445    // Mean evaluation
02446 
02447    double meanEvaluation = evaluation.calculateMean();
02448 
02449    if(reserveMeanEvaluationHistory)
02450    {
02451       meanEvaluationHistory[0] = meanEvaluation;
02452    }
02453 
02454    // Standard deviation of evaluation
02455 
02456    double standardDeviationEvaluation = evaluation.calculateStandardDeviation();
02457 
02458    if(reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory)
02459    {
02460       standardDeviationEvaluationHistory[0] = standardDeviationEvaluation;
02461    }
02462 
02463    // Best individual evaluation
02464 
02465    if(reserveBestEvaluationHistory)
02466    {
02467       bestEvaluationHistory[0] = bestEvaluation;
02468    }
02469 
02470    // Stopping criteria
02471 
02472    if(bestEvaluation <= evaluationGoal)
02473    {          
02474       if(display)
02475       {
02476          std::cout << std::endl
02477                    << "Initial evaluation is less than goal." << std::endl;
02478 
02479          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02480 
02481          std::cout << "Initial mean norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02482          std::cout << "Initial standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02483          std::cout << "Initial best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02484 
02485          std::cout << "Initial mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02486          std::cout << "Initial standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation << std::endl;
02487          std::cout << "Initial best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;
02488 
02489          objectiveFunctional->print();   
02490       }
02491 
02492       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
02493 
02494       return;   
02495    }
02496    else if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
02497    {
02498       if(display)
02499       {
02500          std::cout << std::endl
02501                    << "Maximum training time reached." << std::endl;
02502 
02503          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02504 
02505          std::cout << "Initial mean norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02506          std::cout << "Initial standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02507          std::cout << "Initial best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02508 
02509          std::cout << "Initial mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02510          std::cout << "Initial standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation << std::endl;
02511          std::cout << "Initial best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;
02512 
02513          objectiveFunctional->print();   
02514       }
02515 
02516       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
02517 
02518       return;      
02519    }
02520    else
02521    {
02522       if(display)
02523       {
02524          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02525 
02526          // Print multilayer perceptron stuff
02527 
02528          std::cout << "Mean norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02529          std::cout << "Standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02530          std::cout << "Best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02531 
02532          std::cout << "Mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02533          std::cout << "Standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation << std::endl;
02534          std::cout << "Best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;
02535 
02536          objectiveFunctional->print();
02537       }
02538    }
02539 
02540    // Main loop
02541 
02542    for(int generation = 1; generation <= maximumNumberOfGenerations; generation++)
02543    {
02544       // Generate new population  
02545 
02546       // Fitness assignment
02547 
02548       switch(fitnessAssignmentMethod)
02549       {
02550          case LinearRanking:
02551          { 
02552             performLinearRankingFitnessAssignment();
02553          }
02554 
02555          break;
02556       }
02557 
02558       // Selection
02559 
02560       switch(selectionMethod)
02561       {
02562          case RouletteWheel:
02563          {
02564             performRouletteWheelSelection();
02565          }
02566 
02567          break;
02568 
02569          case StochasticUniversalSampling:
02570          {
02571             performStochasticUniversalSamplingSelection();
02572          }
02573 
02574          break;
02575       }
02576 
02577       // Recombination
02578 
02579       switch(recombinationMethod)
02580       {
02581          case Intermediate:
02582          {
02583             performIntermediateRecombination();
02584          }
02585 
02586          break;
02587 
02588          case Line:
02589          {
02590             performLineRecombination();
02591          } 
02592 
02593          break;
02594       }
02595 
02596       // Mutation
02597 
02598       switch(mutationMethod)
02599       {
02600          case Normal:
02601          {
02602             performNormalMutation();
02603          }
02604 
02605          break;
02606 
02607          case Uniform:
02608          {
02609             performUniformMutation();
02610          }
02611 
02612          break;
02613       }
02614 
02615       // Evaluation of new population
02616 
02617       evaluatePopulation();
02618 
02619       // Check for best individual
02620 
02621       for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02622       {
02623          if(evaluation[i] < bestEvaluation)
02624          {
02625             bestIndividual = getIndividual(i);
02626 
02627             bestNorm = bestIndividual.calculateNorm();
02628 
02629             bestEvaluation = evaluation[i];
02630             
02631             // Set best individual free paramterers to multilayer perceptron
02632 
02633             multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(bestIndividual);              
02634          }
02635       }
02636 
02637       // Elapsed time
02638 
02639       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
02640 
02641       if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02642       {
02643          elapsedTimeHistory[generation] = elapsedTime;
02644       }
02645 
02646       // Population
02647 
02648      if(reservePopulationHistory)
02649      {
02650         populationHistory[generation] = population;
02651      }
02652 
02653      populationNorm = calculatePopulationNorm();
02654 
02655       // Mean norm 
02656 
02657       double meanNorm = populationNorm.calculateMean();
02658 
02659       if(reserveMeanNormHistory)
02660       {
02661          meanNormHistory[generation] = meanNorm;
02662       }
02663 
02664       // Standard deviation of norm
02665 
02666       double standardDeviationNorm = populationNorm.calculateStandardDeviation();
02667 
02668       if(reserveMeanNormHistory)
02669       {
02670          standardDeviationNormHistory[generation] = standardDeviationNorm;                                
02671       }
02672  
02673       // Best individual norm
02674 
02675       if(reserveBestNormHistory)
02676       {
02677          bestNormHistory[generation] = bestNorm;
02678       }
02679 
02680       // Mean evaluation
02681 
02682       double meanEvaluation = evaluation.calculateMean();
02683 
02684       if(reserveMeanEvaluationHistory)
02685       {
02686          meanEvaluationHistory[generation] = meanEvaluation;
02687       }
02688 
02689       // Standard deviation of evaluation
02690 
02691       double standardDeviationEvaluation = evaluation.calculateStandardDeviation();
02692 
02693       if(reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory)
02694       {
02695          standardDeviationEvaluationHistory[generation] = standardDeviationEvaluation;
02696       }
02697 
02698       // Best individual evaluation
02699 
02700       if(reserveBestEvaluationHistory)
02701       {
02702          bestEvaluationHistory[generation] = bestEvaluation;
02703       }
02704 
02705       // Stopping criteria
02706 
02707       if(bestEvaluation <= evaluationGoal)
02708       {
02709          if(display)
02710          {
02711             std::cout << std::endl
02712                       << "Generation " << generation << ": "
02713                       << "Evaluation goal reached." << std::endl;
02714 
02715             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02716 
02717 
02718             std::cout << "Mean free norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02719             std::cout << "Standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02720             std::cout << "Best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02721 
02722             std::cout << "Mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02723             std::cout << "Standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation << std::endl;
02724             std::cout << "Best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;                   
02725 
02726             objectiveFunctional->print();
02727          }
02728          
02729          resizeTrainingHistory(generation);
02730 
02731          break;
02732       }
02733       else if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
02734       {
02735          if(display)
02736          {
02737             std::cout << std::endl
02738                       << "Generation " << generation << ": "
02739                       << "Maximum training time reached." << std::endl;
02740 
02741             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02742 
02743             std::cout << "Mean norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02744             std::cout << "Standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02745             std::cout << "Best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02746 
02747             std::cout << "Mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02748             std::cout << "Standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation  << std::endl;
02749             std::cout << "Best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;
02750 
02751             objectiveFunctional->print();
02752          }
02753 
02754          resizeTrainingHistory(generation);
02755 
02756          break;
02757       }
02758       else if(generation == (maximumNumberOfGenerations - 1))
02759       {
02760          if(display)
02761          {
02762             std::cout << std::endl
02763                       << "Generation " << generation << ": "
02764                       << "Maximum number of generations reached." << std::endl;
02765 
02766             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02767 
02768             std::cout << "Mean norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02769             std::cout << "Standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02770             std::cout << "Best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02771 
02772             std::cout << "Mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02773             std::cout << "Standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation << std::endl;
02774             std::cout << "Best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;                  
02775 
02776             objectiveFunctional->print();
02777          }
02778 
02779          break;
02780       }
02781 
02782       // Progress
02783 
02784       if(display && generation % displayPeriod == 0)
02785       {
02786          std::cout << std::endl
02787                    << "Generation " << generation << "; " << std::endl;
02788 
02789          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
02790 
02791          std::cout << "Mean norm: " << meanNorm << std::endl;
02792          std::cout << "Standard deviation of norm: " << standardDeviationNorm << std::endl;
02793          std::cout << "Best norm: " << bestNorm << std::endl;
02794 
02795          std::cout << "Mean evaluation: " << meanEvaluation << std::endl;
02796          std::cout << "Standard deviation of evaluation: " << standardDeviationEvaluation << std::endl;
02797          std::cout << "Best evaluation: " << bestEvaluation << std::endl;
02798 
02799          objectiveFunctional->print();
02800       }
02801 
02802       // Reset selection vector
02803 
02804       Vector<bool> newSelection(populationSize, false);
02805 
02806       selection = newSelection;
02807    }
02808 }
02809 
02810 
02811 // void print(void) method
02812 
02853 
02854 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::print(void)
02855 {
02856    int numberOfFreeParameters = 0;   
02857    
02858    if(objectiveFunctional != NULL)
02859    {
02860       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02861 
02862       numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02863    }
02864 
02865    std::cout << std::endl
02866              << "Flood Neural Network. Evolutionary Algorithm Object." << std::endl;
02867 
02868    std::cout << "Population size: " << std::endl
02869              << populationSize << std::endl
02870              << "Number of free parameters: " << std::endl
02871              << numberOfFreeParameters  << std::endl;
02872 
02873    // Training operators
02874 
02875    // Fitness assingment method
02876 
02877    std::cout << "Fitness assignment method:" << std::endl;
02878 
02879    if(fitnessAssignmentMethod == LinearRanking)
02880    {
02881       std::cout << "Linear ranking" << std::endl;
02882    }
02883 
02884    // Selection method
02885 
02886    std::cout << "Selection method:" << std::endl;
02887 
02888    if(selectionMethod == RouletteWheel)
02889    {
02890       std::cout << "Roulette wheel" << std::endl;
02891    }
02892    else if(selectionMethod == StochasticUniversalSampling)
02893    {
02894       std::cout << "Stochastic universal sampling" << std::endl;
02895    }
02896 
02897    // Recombination method
02898 
02899    std::cout << "Recombination method:" << std::endl;
02900 
02901    if(recombinationMethod == Line)
02902    {
02903       std::cout << "Line" << std::endl;
02904    }
02905    else if(recombinationMethod == Intermediate)
02906    {
02907       std::cout << "Intermediate" << std::endl;
02908    }
02909 
02910    // Mutation method
02911 
02912    std::cout << "Mutation method:" << std::endl;
02913 
02914    if(mutationMethod == Normal)
02915    {
02916       std::cout << "Normal" << std::endl;
02917    }
02918    else if(mutationMethod == Uniform)
02919    {
02920       std::cout << "Uniform" << std::endl;
02921    }
02922 
02923 
02924    // Training parameters
02925 
02926    std::cout << "Selective pressure: " << std::endl
02927              << selectivePressure << std::endl
02928              << "Recombination size: " << std::endl
02929              << recombinationSize << std::endl
02930              << "Mutation rate: " << std::endl
02931              << mutationRate << std::endl
02932              << "Mutation range: " << std::endl
02933              << mutationRange << std::endl;
02934 
02935    // Stopping criteria
02936 
02937    std::cout << "Evaluation goal: " << std::endl
02938              << evaluationGoal << std::endl
02939              << "Maximum time: " << std::endl
02940              << maximumTime << std::endl
02941              << "Maximum number of generations: " << std::endl
02942              << maximumNumberOfGenerations << std::endl;
02943 
02944    // User stuff
02945 
02946    std::cout << "Display: " << std::endl
02947              << display << std::endl
02948              << "Display period: " << std::endl
02949              << displayPeriod << std::endl;
02950    
02951    std::cout << "Reserve elapsed time history:" << std::endl
02952              << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl
02953              << "Reserve mean norm history:" << std::endl
02954              << reserveMeanNormHistory << std::endl
02955              << "Reserve standard deviation norm history:" << std::endl
02956              << reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory << std::endl
02957              << "Reserve best norm history:" << std::endl
02958              << reserveBestNormHistory << std::endl
02959              << "Reserve mean evaluation history:" << std::endl
02960              << reserveMeanEvaluationHistory << std::endl
02961              << "Reserve standard deviation evaluation history:" << std::endl
02962              << reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory << std::endl
02963              << "Reserve best evaluation history:" << std::endl
02964              << reserveBestEvaluationHistory << std::endl;
02965 
02966    std::cout << "Population:" << std::endl;
02967 
02968    Vector<double> individual(numberOfFreeParameters);
02969 
02970    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
02971    {
02972       individual = getIndividual(i);
02973 
02974       std::cout << "Individual " << i << ":" << std::endl
02975                 << individual << std::endl;     
02976    }
02977 }

02980 // void save(char*) method
02981 
03024 
03025 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::save(char* filename)
03026 {
03027    int numberOfFreeParameters = 0;   
03028    
03029    if(objectiveFunctional != NULL)
03030    {
03031       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
03032 
03033       numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
03034    }
03035 
03036 
03037    // File
03038 
03039    std::fstream file;
03040 
03041    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
03042 
03043    if(!file.is_open())
03044    {
03045       std::cerr << std::endl 
03046                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03047                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
03048                 << "Cannot open evolutionary algorithm object data file."  << std::endl
03049                 << std::endl;
03050 
03051       exit(1);
03052    }
03053    else
03054    {
03055       if(display)
03056       {   
03057          std::cout << std::endl
03058                    << "Saving evolutionary algorithm object to data file..." << std::endl;
03059       }
03060    }
03061 
03062    // Write file header
03063 
03064 
03065    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Evolutionary Algorithm Object." << std::endl;
03066 
03067    file << "PopulationSize:" << std::endl
03068         << populationSize << std::endl
03069         << "NumberOfFreeParameters:" << std::endl
03070         << numberOfFreeParameters  << std::endl;
03071 
03072    // Training operators
03073 
03074    // Fitness assingment method
03075 
03076    file << "FitnessAssignmentMethod:" << std::endl;
03077 
03078    if(fitnessAssignmentMethod == LinearRanking)
03079    {
03080       file << "LinearRanking" << std::endl;
03081    }
03082 
03083    // Selection method
03084 
03085    file << "SelectionMethod:" << std::endl;
03086 
03087    if(selectionMethod == RouletteWheel)
03088    {
03089       file << "RouletteWheel" << std::endl;
03090    }
03091    else if(selectionMethod == StochasticUniversalSampling)
03092    {
03093       file << "StochasticUniversalSampling" << std::endl;
03094    }
03095 
03096    // Recombination method
03097 
03098    file << "RecombinationMethod:" << std::endl;
03099 
03100    if(recombinationMethod == Line)
03101    {
03102       file << "Line" << std::endl;
03103    }
03104    else if(recombinationMethod == Intermediate)
03105    {
03106       file << "Intermediate" << std::endl;
03107    }
03108 
03109    // Mutation method
03110 
03111    file << "MutationMethod:" << std::endl;
03112 
03113    if(mutationMethod == Normal)
03114    {
03115       file << "Normal" << std::endl;
03116    }
03117    else if(mutationMethod == Uniform)
03118    {
03119       file << "Uniform" << std::endl;
03120    }
03121 
03122    // Training parameters
03123 
03124    file << "SelectivePressure:" << std::endl
03125         << selectivePressure << std::endl
03126         << "RecombinationSize:" << std::endl
03127         << recombinationSize << std::endl
03128         << "MutationRate:" << std::endl
03129         << mutationRate << std::endl
03130         << "MutationRange: " << std::endl
03131         << mutationRange << std::endl;
03132 
03133    // Stopping criteria
03134 
03135    file << "EvaluationGoal: " << std::endl
03136         << evaluationGoal << std::endl
03137         << "MaximumTime: " << std::endl
03138         << maximumTime << std::endl
03139         << "MaximumNumberOfGenerations: " << std::endl
03140         << maximumNumberOfGenerations << std::endl;
03141 
03142    // User stuff
03143 
03144    file << "Display: " << std::endl
03145         << display << std::endl
03146         << "DisplayPeriod: " << std::endl
03147         << displayPeriod << std::endl;
03148 
03149    file << "ReserveElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl
03150         << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl
03151         << "ReserveMeanNormHistory:" << std::endl
03152         << reserveMeanNormHistory << std::endl
03153         << "ReserveStandardDeviationNormHistory:" << std::endl
03154         << reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory << std::endl
03155         << "ReserveBestNormHistory:" << std::endl
03156         << reserveBestNormHistory << std::endl
03157         << "ReserveMeanEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl
03158         << reserveMeanEvaluationHistory << std::endl
03159         << "ReserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl
03160         << reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory << std::endl
03161         << "ReserveBestEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl
03162         << reserveBestEvaluationHistory << std::endl;
03163 
03164    // Population
03165 
03166    file << "Population:" << std::endl;
03167 
03168    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
03169    {
03170       Vector<double> individual = getIndividual(i);
03171 
03172       file << "Individual" << i << ":" << std::endl; 
03173 
03174       file << individual << std::endl;
03175 
03176       file << std::endl;
03177    }
03178 
03179    file.close();
03180 }

03182 
03183 // void load(char*) method
03184 
03228 
03229 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::load(char* filename)
03230 {
03231    // Multilayer perceptron
03232 
03233    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
03234 
03235    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
03236 
03237    // File
03238 
03239    std::fstream file;
03240 
03241    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
03242 
03243    if(!file.is_open())
03244    {
03245       std::cerr << std::endl
03246                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03247                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03248                 << "Cannot open evolutionary algorithm object data file."  << std::endl
03249                                 << std::endl;
03250 
03251       exit(1);
03252    }
03253    else
03254    {
03255       if(display)
03256       {
03257          std::cout << std::endl
03258                    << "Loading evolutionary algorithm object from data file..."  
03259                    << std::endl;
03260       }
03261    }
03262 
03263    // Load new number of individuals and new number of free parameters form file
03264 
03265    int newPopulationSize = 0;
03266    int newNumberOfFreeParameters = 0;
03267 
03268    std::string word;
03269 
03270    // Training parameters
03271 
03272    // Population size
03273 
03274    while(word != "PopulationSize:")
03275    {
03276       file >> word;
03277    }
03278 
03279    file >> newPopulationSize;
03280 
03281    if(newPopulationSize != populationSize)
03282    {
03283       std::cerr << std::endl
03284                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03285                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03286                 << "New population size is not equal to population size." << std::endl
03287                 << std::endl;
03288 
03289       exit(1);
03290   }
03291 
03292    // Number of free parameters
03293 
03294    file >> word;
03295 
03296    file >> newNumberOfFreeParameters;
03297 
03298    if(newNumberOfFreeParameters != numberOfFreeParameters)
03299    {
03300       std::cerr << std::endl
03301                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03302                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03303                 << "New number of free parameters is not equal to number of free parameters."
03304                 << std::endl << std::endl;
03305 
03306       exit(1);
03307    }
03308 
03309 
03310    // Training operators
03311 
03312    // Fitness assingment method
03313 
03314    file >> word;
03315 
03316    if(word != "FitnessAssingmentMethod:")
03317    {
03318       std::cerr << std::endl
03319                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03320                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03321                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03322 
03323       exit(1);   
03324    }
03325 
03326    file >> word;
03327 
03328    if(word == "LinearRanking")
03329    {
03330       fitnessAssignmentMethod = LinearRanking;
03331    }
03332    else
03333    {
03334       std::cerr << std::endl
03335                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03336                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03337                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03338 
03339       exit(1);   
03340    }
03341 
03342    // Selection method
03343  
03344    file >> word;
03345 
03346    if(word != "SelectionMethod:")
03347    {
03348       std::cerr << std::endl
03349                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03350                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03351                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03352 
03353       exit(1);   
03354    }
03355 
03356    file >> word;
03357 
03358    if(word == "RouletteWheel")
03359    {
03360       selectionMethod = RouletteWheel;
03361    }
03362    else if(word == "StochasticUniversalSampling")
03363    {
03364       selectionMethod = StochasticUniversalSampling;
03365    } 
03366    else
03367    {
03368       std::cerr << std::endl
03369                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03370                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03371                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03372 
03373       exit(1);   
03374    }
03375 
03376    // Recombination method
03377 
03378    file >> word;
03379 
03380    if(word != "RecombinationMethod:")
03381    {
03382       std::cerr << std::endl
03383                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03384                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03385                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03386 
03387       exit(1);   
03388    }
03389 
03390    file >> word;
03391 
03392    if(word == "Line")
03393    {
03394       recombinationMethod = Line;
03395    }
03396    else if(word == "Intermediate")
03397    {
03398       recombinationMethod = Intermediate;
03399    } 
03400    else
03401    {
03402       std::cerr << std::endl
03403                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03404                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03405                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03406 
03407       exit(1);   
03408    }
03409 
03410    // Mutation method
03411 
03412    file >> word;
03413 
03414    if(word != "MutationMethod:")
03415    {
03416       std::cerr << std::endl
03417                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03418                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03419                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03420 
03421       exit(1);   
03422    }
03423 
03424    file >> word;
03425 
03426    if(word == "Normal")
03427    {
03428       mutationMethod = Normal;
03429    }
03430    else if(word == "Uniform")
03431    {
03432       mutationMethod = Uniform;
03433    } 
03434    else
03435    {
03436       std::cerr << std::endl
03437                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03438                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03439                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
03440 
03441       exit(1);   
03442    }
03443 
03444    // Training parameters
03445 
03446    // Selective pressure
03447 
03448    file >> word;
03449 
03450    if(word != "SelectivePressure:")
03451    {
03452       std::cerr << std::endl
03453                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03454                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03455                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03456                 << std::endl;
03457 
03458       exit(1);   
03459    }
03460 
03461    file >> selectivePressure;
03462 
03463    // Recombination size
03464 
03465    file >> word;
03466 
03467    if(word != "RecombinationSize")
03468    {
03469       std::cerr << std::endl
03470                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03471                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03472                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03473                 << std::endl;
03474 
03475       exit(1);   
03476    }
03477 
03478    file >> recombinationSize;
03479 
03480    // Mutation rate
03481 
03482    file >> word;
03483 
03484    if(word != "MutationRate:")
03485    {
03486       std::cerr << std::endl
03487                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03488                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03489                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03490                 << std::endl;
03491 
03492       exit(1);   
03493    }
03494 
03495    file >> mutationRate;
03496 
03497    // Mutation range
03498  
03499    file >> word;
03500 
03501    if(word != "MutationRange:")
03502    {
03503       std::cerr << std::endl
03504                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03505                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03506                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03507                 << std::endl;
03508 
03509       exit(1);   
03510    }
03511 
03512    file >> mutationRange;
03513 
03514    // Stopping criteria: 
03515 
03516    // Evaluation goal
03517 
03518    file >> word;
03519 
03520    if(word != "EvaluationGoal:")
03521    {
03522       std::cerr << std::endl
03523                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03524                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03525                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03526                 << std::endl;
03527 
03528       exit(1);   
03529    }
03530 
03531    file >> evaluationGoal;
03532 
03533    // Maximum time
03534 
03535    file >> word;
03536 
03537    if(word != "MaximumTime:")
03538    {
03539       std::cerr << std::endl
03540                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03541                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03542                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03543                 << std::endl;
03544 
03545       exit(1);   
03546    }
03547 
03548    file >> maximumTime;
03549    
03550    // Maximum number of generations
03551 
03552    file >> word;
03553 
03554    if(word != "MaximumNumberOfGenerations:")
03555    {
03556       std::cerr << std::endl
03557                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03558                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03559                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03560                 << std::endl;
03561 
03562       exit(1);   
03563    }
03564 
03565    file >> maximumNumberOfGenerations;
03566 
03567    // User stuff: 
03568 
03569    // Display
03570 
03571    file >> word;
03572 
03573    if(word != "Display:")
03574    {
03575       std::cerr << std::endl
03576                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03577                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03578                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03579                 << std::endl;
03580 
03581       exit(1);   
03582    }
03583 
03584    file >> display;
03585 
03586    // Display period
03587 
03588    file >> word;
03589 
03590    if(word != "DisplayPeriod:")
03591    {
03592       std::cerr << std::endl
03593                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03594                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03595                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03596                 << std::endl;
03597 
03598       exit(1);   
03599    }
03600 
03601    file >> displayPeriod;
03602 
03603    // Reserve elapsed time history
03604 
03605    file >> word;
03606 
03607    if(word != "ReserveElapsedTimeHistory:")
03608    {
03609       std::cerr << std::endl
03610                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03611                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03612                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03613                 << std::endl;
03614 
03615       exit(1);   
03616    }
03617 
03618    file >> reserveElapsedTimeHistory;
03619 
03620    // Reserve mean norm history
03621 
03622    file >> word;
03623 
03624    if(word != "ReserveMeanNormHistory:")
03625    {
03626       std::cerr << std::endl
03627                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03628                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03629                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03630                 << std::endl;
03631 
03632       exit(1);   
03633    }
03634 
03635    file >> reserveMeanNormHistory;
03636

03638 
03639    file >> word;
03640 
03641    if(word != "ReserveStandardDeviationNormHistory:")
03642    {
03643       std::cerr << std::endl
03644                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03645                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03646                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03647                 << std::endl;
03648 
03649       exit(1);   
03650    }
03651 
03652    file >> reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory;
03653 
03654    // Reserve best norm history
03655 
03656    file >> word;
03657 
03658    if(word != "ReserveBestNormHistory:")
03659    {
03660       std::cerr << std::endl
03661                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03662                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03663                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03664                 << std::endl;
03665 
03666       exit(1);   
03667    }
03668 
03669    file >> reserveBestNormHistory;
03670 
03671    // Reserve mean evaluation history
03672 
03673    file >> word;
03674 
03675    if(word != "ReserveMeanEvaluationHistory:")
03676    {
03677       std::cerr << std::endl
03678                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03679                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03680                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03681                 << std::endl;
03682 
03683       exit(1);   
03684    }
03685 
03686    file >> reserveMeanEvaluationHistory;
03687 
03688    // Reserve standard deviation evaluation history
03689 
03690    file >> word;
03691 
03692    if(word != "ReserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory:")
03693    {
03694       std::cerr << std::endl
03695                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03696                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03697                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03698                 << std::endl;
03699 
03700       exit(1);   
03701    }
03702 
03703    file >> reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory;
03704 
03705    // Reserve best evaluation history
03706 
03707    file >> word;
03708 
03709    if(word != "ReserveBestEvaluationHistory:")
03710    {
03711       std::cerr << std::endl
03712                 << "Flood Error: EvolutionaryAlgorithm class." << std::endl
03713                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
03714                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
03715                 << std::endl;
03716 
03717       exit(1);   
03718    }
03719 
03720    file >> reserveBestEvaluationHistory;
03721 
03722    // Population
03723 
03724    file >> word;
03725 
03726    for(int i = 0; i < populationSize; i++)
03727    {
03728       file >> word;
03729 
03730       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
03731       {
03732          file >> population[i][j];
03733       }
03734    }
03735 
03736    // Close file
03737 
03738    file.close();
03739 }
03740 
03741 
03742 // void resizeTrainingHistory(int) method
03743 
03759 
03760 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::resizeTrainingHistory(int newSize)
03761 {
03762    // Elapsed time history vector
03763 
03764    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
03765    {
03766       elapsedTimeHistory.resize(newSize);
03767    }
03768 
03769    // Population history
03770 
03771    if(reservePopulationHistory)
03772    {
03773       populationHistory.resize(newSize);
03774    }
03775 
03776    // Mean population norm history vector
03777 
03778    if(reserveMeanNormHistory)
03779    {
03780       meanNormHistory.resize(newSize);
03781    }
03782 
03783    // Standard deviation population norm history vector
03784 
03785    if(reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory)
03786    {
03787       standardDeviationNormHistory.resize(newSize);
03788    }
03789 
03790    // Best individual norm history vector
03791 
03792    if(reserveBestNormHistory)
03793    {
03794       bestNormHistory.resize(newSize);
03795    }
03796 
03797    // Mean evaluation history history vector
03798 
03799    if(reserveMeanEvaluationHistory)
03800    {
03801       meanEvaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
03802    }
03803  
03804    // Standard deviation of evaluation history vector
03805 
03806    if(reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory)
03807    {
03808       standardDeviationEvaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
03809    }
03810 
03811    // Best evaluation history vector
03812 
03813    if(reserveBestEvaluationHistory)
03814    {
03815       bestEvaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
03816    }
03817 }
03818 
03819 
03820 // void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method
03821 
03825 
03826 void EvolutionaryAlgorithm::saveTrainingHistory(char* filename)
03827 
03828 {
03829    std::fstream file; 
03830 
03831    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
03832 
03833    // Write file header 
03834 
03835    if(!file.is_open())
03836    {
03837       std::cerr << std::endl 
03838                 << "Flood Error: Evolutionary Algorithm class." << std::endl
03839                 << "void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method." << std::endl
03840                 << "Cannot open training history data file." << std::endl
03841                 << std::endl;
03842 
03843       exit(1);
03844    }
03845    else
03846    {
03847       if(display)
03848       {
03849          std::cout << std::endl 
03850                    << "Saving training history to data file..." << std::endl;
03851       }
03852    }
03853 
03854    // Write file header
03855 
03856    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Evolutionary Training History." << std::endl;
03857 
03858    // Write file data
03859 
03860    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
03861    {
03862       file << "ElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl;
03863       file << elapsedTimeHistory << std::endl;      
03864    }
03865    if(reservePopulationHistory)
03866    {
03867       file << "PopulationHistory:" << std::endl;
03868       file << populationHistory << std::endl;      
03869    }
03870    if(reserveMeanNormHistory)
03871    {
03872       file << "MeanNormHistory:" << std::endl;
03873       file << meanNormHistory << std::endl;      
03874    }
03875    if(reserveStandardDeviationNormHistory)
03876    {
03877       file << "StandardDeviationNormHistory:" << std::endl;
03878       file << standardDeviationNormHistory << std::endl;      
03879    }
03880    if(reserveBestNormHistory)
03881    {
03882       file << "BestNormHistory:" << std::endl;
03883       file << bestNormHistory << std::endl;      
03884    }
03885    if(reserveMeanEvaluationHistory)
03886    {
03887       file << "MeanEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
03888       file << meanEvaluationHistory << std::endl;      
03889    }
03890    if(reserveStandardDeviationEvaluationHistory)
03891    {
03892       file << "StandardDeviationEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
03893       file << standardDeviationEvaluationHistory << std::endl;      
03894    }
03895    if(reserveBestEvaluationHistory)
03896    {
03897       file << "BestEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
03898       file << bestEvaluationHistory << std::endl;      
03899    }
03900 
03901    file.close();     
03902      
03903 }
03904 
03905 
03906 }
